publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3486 Aileen Campbell: Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award—That the Parliament congratulates journalist Ken Rundle on winning the inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award; notes that the award has been established by NFU Scotland to recognise the agricultural industry’s ambassadors and those who, through their own efforts, have played an influential role in communicating the work and challenges and the value of farming to a wider audience; further notes Ken Rundle’s many years of service in communicating and reporting on the Scottish agricultural industry, and looks forward to the award recognising others who have made important contributions to the industry in years to come.

S3M-3486 Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Nigel Don*, Elizabeth Smith*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bob Doris*, Bill Kidd*, Jamie McGrigor*, John Lamont*, Robin Harper*, Sandra White*
S3M-3486 Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Jamie Hepburn*, Liam McArthur*, Michael Matheson*, Gil Paterson*, Stuart McMillan*, Christine Grahame*
S3M-3486 Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) David Stewart*
S3M-3486 Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) Rhoda Grant*
S3M-3486 Inaugural NFU Scotland Ambassador Award (lodged on 20 February 2009) John Scott*
